trans-unit.source: Displays the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Visar innehållet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You typically use the ContentPresenter in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> to specify where the content is to be added.
trans-unit.target: Normalt använder du ContentPresenter i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>kan du ange om innehållet som ska läggas till.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> type has a ContentPresenter in its default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Varje <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>typ har en ContentPresenter i standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: When a ContentPresenter object is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: När en ContentPresenter-objektet är i ett <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Egenskaper får sina värden från egenskaper med samma namn i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: You can have the ContentPresenter property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property or binding to them.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ha egenskapen ContentPresenter hämta värden för dessa egenskaper från andra egenskaper för mallbaserat överordnade genom att ange den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskapen eller bindning till dem.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ContentPresenter uses the following logic to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: ContentPresenter använder följande logik för att visa den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>: – om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>på ContentPresenter egenskapen, ContentPresenter gäller som <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskap och den resulterande <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>och dess underordnade element eventuella visas.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>objekt, se [Templating översikt över](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property on the ContentPresenter is set, the ContentPresenter applies the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>på ContentPresenter egenskapen, ContentPresenter gäller lämplig <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskap och den resulterande <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>och dess underordnade element eventuella visas.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> associated with the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, the ContentPresenter applies that <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> property and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> and its child elements, if any, are displayed.
trans-unit.target: – Om det finns en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>som är associerade med typ av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, ContentPresenter gäller som <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>till den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>egenskap och den resulterande <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>och dess underordnade element eventuella visas.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> object, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -Om <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>är en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objekt, den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>visas.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> already has a parent, an exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>har redan en överordnad ett undantag inträffar.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and the resulting <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: – Om det finns en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>som konverterar typ av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>till en <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, ContentPresenter används den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>och den resulterande <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>visas.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: - If there is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> that converts the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string, the ContentPresenter uses that <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain that string.
trans-unit.target: – Om det finns en <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>som konverterar typ av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>en sträng, använder ContentPresenter som <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>och skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>som innehåller strängen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>visas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: - If the content is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>, the value of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property is displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: – Om innehållet är ett <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>värdet på <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>egenskapen visas i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: - The ContentPresenter calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> and creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> to contain the string returned by <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -ContentPresenter anropar <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoden på <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>och skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>som innehåller strängen som returnerades av <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>visas.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Positions the single child element and determines the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Placerar det enda underordnat elementet och avgör innehållet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The size that this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object should use to arrange its child element.
trans-unit.target: Storleken som den här <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objektet ska använda för att ordna dess underordnade element.

trans-unit.source: The actual size needed by the element.
trans-unit.target: Den verkliga storleken som krävs av elementet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the template to use.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar mallen som ska användas.

trans-unit.source: This may depend on the content or other properties.
trans-unit.target: Detta kan bero på innehållet eller andra egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: The base class implements the following rules: 1.
trans-unit.target: Basklassen implementerar följande regler: 1.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> is set, use it.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>är använder det.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> is set, call its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Om <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>anges anropa dess <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A>metod.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector.SelectTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the result is not `null`, use it.
trans-unit.target: Om resultatet inte är `null`, använda den.

trans-unit.source: Look for a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate> whose <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> matches the content among the resources known to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> (including application, theme, and system resources).
trans-unit.target: Leta efter en <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>vars <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A>matchar innehållet bland de resurser som är kända för det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>(inklusive program, tema och resurser).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>

trans-unit.source: If one is found, use it.
trans-unit.target: Om en sådan finns, använda den.

trans-unit.source: If the type of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> is "common", use a standard template.
trans-unit.target: Om typ av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>är "vanlig" använda en standardmall.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: The common types are `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: De vanliga typerna är `String`, <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>, och <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> to a string and displays it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: Annars kan använda en standardmall som i stort sett konverterar <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>till en sträng och visas i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.
trans-unit.target: Härledda klasser kan åsidosätta de här reglerna och implementera sina egna.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data used to generate the child elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger de data som används för att generera de underordnade elementen i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you place a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, it automatically displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the templated control.
trans-unit.target: När du monterar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, visar den automatiskt den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>mallbaserat kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: This means that if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A> of your <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, the Content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is implicitly bound to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that is using that <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: Detta innebär att om du ställer in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>för din <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>innehållsegenskapen för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>är implicit bunden till <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>av <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>som använder den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate.TargetType%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set up bindings for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> properties, you may want to consider using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Att ställa in bindningarna för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>Egenskaper, du kanske vill använda den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A> property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>egenskapen pekar på en egenskap utan mall överordnade samt alias tillhörande mall och selector mallegenskaper automatiskt.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control.
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Text användning normalt använder du `TemplateBinding` att binda egenskapsvärdet till ett värde på mallbaserat kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: För [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, se [Markeringstillägget](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`||

trans-unit.source: The data used to generate the child elements.
trans-unit.target: De data som används för att generera de underordnade elementen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det grundläggande namnet ska användas vid automatisk alias.

trans-unit.source: This property should only be used when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> is in a template.
trans-unit.target: Bara den här egenskapen ska användas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>finns i mallen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: When a template contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> with ContentSource set to "`Abc`", the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively.
trans-unit.target: När en mall innehåller en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>med ContentSource inställd på "`Abc`", <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>, och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>Egenskaper för den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>blir automatiskt ett alias till `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, och `AbcTemplateSelector`respektive.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting ContentSource to "`Abc`" also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A> property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`.
trans-unit.target: Från och med den [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/add/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], ställa in ContentSource till "`Abc`" även gör den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>egenskapen ha alias till `AbcStringFormat`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header".
trans-unit.target: De två mest användbara värdena för den här egenskapen är "Innehållet" och "".

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
trans-unit.target: Det grundläggande namnet ska användas vid automatisk alias.

trans-unit.source: The default is "Content".
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är "Innehåll".

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentSource*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger en sammansatt sträng som anger att formatera den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>egenskapen om det visas som en sträng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: ContentStringFormat can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format.
trans-unit.target: ContentStringFormat kan vara en fördefinierad sammansatta eller anpassade strängformat.

trans-unit.source: For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om-strängformat finns [formatering typer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, the ContentStringFormat property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Om du ställer in den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A>-egenskapen för en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, ContentStringFormat egenskapen ignoreras.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Beroendeegenskapsinformation ||| |-|-| | ID-fältet | | | Metadata egenskaperna **SANT**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*> property if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: En sammansatt sträng som anger att formatera den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>egenskapen om det visas som en sträng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.Content*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den mall som används för att visa innehållet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that defines the visualization of the content.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> som definierar visualisering av innehållet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref>, which allows the application writer to provide custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref>, vilket gör att programskrivaren egen kod att välja den mall som används för att visa innehållet i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Den här egenskapen ignoreras om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Mer information finns i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ChooseTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Text användning för [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, se [Markeringstillägget](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that supplies logic to return a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"> </xref> objekt som tillhandahåller logik för att returnera en <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> ska gälla.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifierar den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>beroendeegenskap.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Determines the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> object based on the sizing properties, margin, and requested size of the child content.
trans-unit.target: Bestämmer storleken på den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> objekt baserat på egenskaperna storlek marginal och begärda storleken på det underordnade innehållet.

trans-unit.source: An upper limit value that the return value should not exceed.
trans-unit.target: En övre gräns-värde som returvärdet inte får överstiga.

trans-unit.source: The size that is required to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: Den storlek som krävs för att ordna underordnade innehåll.

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Anropas när den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>egenskapsändringar.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"></xref> should use <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"></xref> in its style.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter"> </xref> ska använda <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.AccessText"> </xref> i dess format.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether serialization processes should serialize the effective value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*> property on instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om serialisering processer ska serialisera det giltiga värdet för <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>egenskapen på instanser av den här klassen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.ContentTemplateSelector*>
